name: PARISH OF ASCENSION
sampleDescriptions: Assist in securing federal funding priority projects for the Parish of Ascension. Assist in securing federal funding for a hurricane protection levee. Secure meetings with Members of Congress.
Secure funding for major arteries in the Parish of Ascension to alleviate growing traffic and populations issues on the Parish of Ascension.

Assist Ascension parish with recovery following Louisiana Flood of 2016 and set-up meetings to discuss hurricane recovery and federal assistance. Assist with levee advocacy and set-up meetings to disc
Continue to work with the USACE to secure a hurricane protection levee for the Parish of Ascension.

Assist Ascension parish with recovery following Louisiana Flood of 2016 and set-up meetings to discuss hurricane recovery and federal assistance. Assist with levee advocacy and set-up meetings to disc
